sentences: Akụkọ
Egwuregwu
Ihe nkiri
Nke ka ewuewu
Akụkọ
Egwuregwu
Ihe nkiri
Nke ka ewuewu
Ebe foto si, Getty/Fr Augustine Abiagom

Otu ụkọchukwu Katolik bụ Fada Augustine Abiagom adọtaala okwu na soshal midia dịka ọ gwara onye ndu otu nnweereonwe Biafra bụ Indigenous People of Biafra(Ipob) bụ Nnamdi Kanu uche ya maka ikwugide Bishọp ụka Katọlik bụ Bishop Mathew Kukah.
Bishop Kukah nwere ikike ikpere Chi ya n'ụzọ ọbụla - Garba Shehu
A kwaala Onyeisiala Buhari emu na Maiduguri
Fada Abiagom katọrọ Nnamdi Kanu maka imaja Bishop Katolik si na ya ga-abụ ya ọnụ n'ọha ma ọ bụrụ na ọ kwụsịghị ikwu ọ kpọrọ "okwu ga-ewe Chineke Iwe".
N'ozi ahụ nke ọ gbasara n'intanet na mbido izu a, Kanu gwara ndị ụka Katolik na ụwa niile sị, "Dọọnụ Bishop Kukah aka na ntị, emeghị etu a, a ga-am abụ ya ọnụ n'ọha."
Bishọpụ Mathew Kukah
Aka Kanu rụrụ Kukah n'ihu na-abịa dịka Kukah bụ Bishop Sokoto Dayọsisi ụbọchịụka na " O nweghị ihe onye ọbụla ga-erite ma ọ bụrụ na Naijiria ekewaa."
Kukah gakwara n'ihu ozi ahụ nke ụlọakụkọ Vanguard wepụtara sị,  "Echeghị m na onye Naijiriaọbụla iji uche ya ga-ameme ka na ọ nweghị ihe jikọrọ anyị ọnụ."
Okwu ndị a bụ ihe ụfọdụ na-ekwu kpasuru Nnamdi Kanu bụ onye na-agba mbọ ka e kewapụta Biafra na Naijiria, iwe.
Fada Abiagom kwuru na ụdị okwu mkpali ahụ megide nnukwu ụkọchukwu Katolic jọgburu udele sigbuo nkapi n'isi.
Abiagom, kwuru na o nweghị ihe ọjọọ dị n'ihe Bishop kwuru maka ịdịkọnotu na-agbanyeghị ebe onye si.
'Ndi uweojii ejighị Nnamdi Kanu na Singapore'
"Ọ bụrụ na  i kwenyeghị ihe Bishop kwuru maka ịdịnaotu, nke ahụ bụechiche ya, i nwere ike ịgba ya na ejighị iwe na mkpalị megide ọkwa Bishọpụ na anọchite."

Fada Abiagom onye jiri Moses n'Akwukwọ nso were maa atụ, kwuru na ọchikọtara ndị okenye ya na ha nyụọ mmamiri ọnụ iji nweta nnwereonwe ụmụ Izrel, kwuru na ipob agaghị achịta aja maọbụ na ha ndị nọ n'ọchịchị jikọta aka chọwa ihe dara mmiri.
Ọ gara n'ihu dụọ Kanu ọdụ ka ọ ghara ịhapụ "ọrụ nnwereonwe Chukwu kpọrọ ya mee onwe ya "Chukwu."
N'okwu ya, Abiagọm  sị,"Onye pụrụ ịbụ ụkọchukwu nke Chineke,nnukwu Bishop e doro nso nakwa onye apọsttụ ụka ọnụ? A gafela oke na ọrụ Chineke nyere ya."
Na ịzaghachi ya, otu Ipob kwuru na ha na Fada Abiagom enweghị okwu ọbụla n'ihi na ọ bụghị ọnụ na-ekwuru Kukah.

N'ọsịsa nke ọkaiwu otu Ipob bụ Aloy Ejimakor nyere BBC n'ekwenti, ha kwuru na o nweghị o nweghị esemokwu dị n'etiti Kukah na Ipob maọbụ onye ndu ha mana ọ bụụ na Kukah kwuo ihe ha anabataghị, na ha nwere ikike ịgbagha ya bụ okwu.
Ihe mere Facebook ji machie Nnamdi kanu
"O nweghị onye ga-akụkọ Fada Kukah na Nnamdi Kanu isi."
"O kwuo ihe metụtara Ipob maọbụ ihe Ipob achọghị, Ipob na onye ndu ha bụ Nnamdi Kanu, ha nwere ikike ikwu uche ha iji saa ya."
"O nwere ndị na-achọ ịkụkọ ha abụọ isi, ọ gaghị adị ile."
"Fada ahụ abụghị ọnụ na-ekwuru Fada Kukah, anyị enweghị ihe."
N'aka nke ọzọ, ebe ụfọdụ na-eto Fada Abiagom, ụfọdụ ndị mmadụ na-akatọ ya, na-ajụ ya ebe ọ nọ kemgbe ihe na emebi ghara itinye ọnụ ịkatọ ihe ndị naa-emebi na Naijiria.
A kwaala Onyeisiala Buhari emu na Maiduguri
